integration_patterns: Data Ingestion Pipelines using AWS Kinesis

evidence.claim: Zallud uses AWS Lambda for serverless functions and API processing.
They implement HL7 FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Zallud processes healthcare claims using X12 transaction sets.
The company leverages Azure Functions for cloud-based operations.
Data pipelines are managed with AWS Kinesis to handle real-time data streams.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards and APIs for healthcare data integration, indicating a likely ICP fit.
matched_use_cases: EDI Integration for Payers and Providers
